message.body: Yeah you need one that's one piece with two knobs
Or atleast one made with the supplies separated. ie not for a single hole installation
This is what I have. Very cheap from maybe Home Depot. It's chrome but i think it looks pretty classic
Thanks. I'll get a one piece fixture.

No go on the truck tomorrow. I'll pick up some outlets and boxes at lowes on the way in and we'll work on sorting the electrical around the house. I can call southwest windows in the morning and see if they have a window in stock to fit your bathroom. Home Depot didn't
